channel.title: SomeScape
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/logo1.png[/img][/center] [center] Greetings! Welcome to SomeScape! I've seen all over the internet how much people miss this classic game, so I remade it! It is almost identicle to the original SomeScape from 2005 and it's very fun to play. I have spent most of my time remaking it and I'm proud to say that I'm finished.Please come and join because there will be a 15B drop party So don't miss out! Here are some pictures of this wonderful game! We offer friendly staff, a great game, and no lag. Hopefully you enjoy SomeScape! Have fun
Main room. [img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/somescape/mainroom.png[/img]
How to level up:
Attack. [img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/somescape/Attack.png[/img]
Strength. [img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/somescape/strength.png[/img]
Defence and HP. [img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/somescape/hpdef.png[/img]
Prayer. [img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/somescape/prayer.png[/img]
[img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/somescape/prayermore.png[/img]
PvP. [img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/somescape/PK.png[/img]
[img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/somescape/pksystem.png[/img]
Shops. [img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/somescape/shops1.png[/img]
[img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/somescape/shops2.png[/img]
Skills. [img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/somescape/skills2.png[/img]
[img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/somescape/firemaking.png[/img]
[img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/somescape/cooking.png[/img]
[img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/somescape/fishing.png[/img]
[img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/somescape/Theiving.png[/img]
[img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/somescape/Woodcutting.png[/img]
How to farm.
Rake patch. [img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/somescape/raking.png[/img]
Use weeds on bin. [img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/somescape/bin.png[/img]
Use seeds on patch. You must have a seed dibber. [img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/somescape/useseeds.png[/img]
Wait... [img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/somescape/wait.png[/img]
Farming notification system will let you know when its done. [img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/somescape/done.png[/img]
[img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/somescape/herb.png[/img]
[img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/somescape/agility.png[/img]
[img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/somescape/fletch.png[/img]
[img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/somescape/mining.png[/img]
[img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/somescape/Smithing.png[/img]
[img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/somescape/runecraft.png[/img]
Awesome SomeScape armour.
3rd Best armour. [img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/somescape/armour1.png[/img]
2nd Best armour. [img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/somescape/armour2.png[/img]
1st Best armour. [img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/somescape/armour3.png[/img]
Clan chat. [img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/somescape/cc.png[/img]
Teleports.
[img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/somescape/combattraining.png[/img]
[img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/somescape/skills.png[/img]
[img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/somescape/random.png[/img]
[img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/somescape/minigames.png[/img]
[img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/somescape/pvp.png[/img]
[img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/somescape/gooddrops.png[/img]
Jad. [img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/somescape/gooddrops.png[/img]
Barbarian Assault. [img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/somescape/barb.png[/img]
Working Prayer. [img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/somescape/workinprayer.png[/img]
Latest Updates. [img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/somescape/latest.png[/img]
Working XP lock. [img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/somescape/lock.png[/img]
All emotes work. [img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/somescape/emotes.png[/img]
[/center]

IT’S A REUNION, SO IF U MISS THE SOMESCAPE COME BACK NOW!!![/quote]

Don’t gravedig you fucking faggot.

item.title: SomeScape
item.dc:creator: @Pzezima2 Pzezima2
item.description:
@Pzezima2 wrote:

booster:

i remember somescape. i was the co owner Mac3j. i actually had the source at one point. before Chris shut the server down he offered it to me. but i have a new comp, and no longer have it. but good luck, if its as good as the last one i might come back to play.

join the site dude, ive got beta testers and its almost identicle as the real somescape.
good good good fkn times

Read full topic

Greetings! Welcome to SomeScape! I’ve seen all over the internet how much people miss this classic game, so I remade it! It is almost identicle to the original SomeScape from 2005 and it’s very fun to play. I have spent most of my time remaking it and I’m proud to say that I’m finished.Please come and join because there will be a 15B drop party So don’t miss out!
